subject: Coaches and Managers
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Washington Manager Jim Riggleman abruptly resigned after the host Nationals beat the Seattle Mariners, 1-0, Thursday for their 11th win in 12 games.
snippet: Washington Manager Jim Riggleman abruptly resigned after the host Nationals beat the Seattle Mariners, 1-0, Thursday for their 11th win in 12 games.
